QuadstickProfileSwitch: To activate a configuration file, start with a long sip on the side tube. When the purple leds start flashing, move the joystick right or left to select the desired file. Press the Lip button to select file.
QuadstickProfiles:
Profiles downloaded to Quadstick.
Hit 'See Profile List and Info' to view profile configurations
UserProfiles:
Double click CSV to open in Google Drive and edit.
Drag files over to download to Quadstick.
FactoryProfiles:
Double click CSV to open in Google Drive, then copy and edit it.
Drag files over to download to Quadstick.
